no_mods_found_desc: No mods found in the selected folder. Please check your Steam Workshop path in Settings.
mod_scan_fail: Failed to scan mods. Make sure the backend is running and the path is correct.
enter_project_id_upload: Enter ParaTranz Project ID to upload "{name}":
enter_project_id_download: Enter ParaTranz Project ID to download translations for "{name}":
synced_note: You still need to create a .mod file manually or use the launcher to recognize it.
no_token: Please set your ParaTranz API Token in Settings first.
vanilla_path_desc: * Used to copy official translations for matching text (Translation Memory).
glossary_desc: Define words that should be translated specifically. Useful for names, ranks, or lore terms.
enable_paratranz_desc: Allow uploading/downloading translation files directly to ParaTranz.
paratranz_token_placeholder: Paste your ParaTranz API Token here
paratranz_link_desc: Go to ParaTranz Profile to get your token.
no_projects: No projects found or token invalid.
model_fetch_fail: No models found or invalid key.
ollama_fetch_fail: No models found. Check if Ollama is running.
ollama_conn_fail: Failed to connect to Ollama. Ensure it's running.
auto_upload_desc: Automatically upload source files (and link translations) to ParaTranz after processing completes.
paratranz_project_id_desc: If set, uploads will default to this project ID unless overridden.
auto_shutdown_desc: Automatically shut down the computer when translation is complete.
